text: Ray Walker (born March 16, 1934) is an American singer and musician. He is a member of the singing group The Jordanaires. Walker has been the bass singer for the group since 1958. During his tenure with The Jordanaires, the group was added into the Country Music Hall of Fame. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:American gospel singers Category:American gospel musicians Category:Musicians from Missouri Category:Singers from Missouri Category:People from Springfield, Missouri
title: Ray Walker (singer)
